name: Alice Weaver
headline: Master Quilter & Textile Artist
bio: Passionate about traditional quilting techniques and modern textile art. Love creating intricate patterns and teaching others the craft. Specialize in hand-stitched quilts and fabric collage.

name: Bella Stitch
headline: Embroidery Artist & Pattern Designer
bio: Creating beautiful hand-embroidered pieces and designing original patterns. Focus on botanical motifs and vintage-inspired designs. Always experimenting with new stitches and techniques.

name: Clara Knits
headline: Knitting Instructor & Yarn Enthusiast
bio: Teaching knitting to beginners and creating complex cable patterns. Passionate about sustainable yarns and helping others discover the joy of knitting. Love designing cozy sweaters and accessories.

name: Diana Crafts
headline: Mixed Media Artist & Upcycling Expert
bio: Transforming found materials into beautiful art pieces. Specialize in upcycling fabric scraps, paper, and vintage finds into mixed media collages and home decor. Advocate for sustainable crafting practices.

name: Ella Sews
headline: Garment Maker & Tailoring Specialist
bio: Creating custom clothing and teaching sewing techniques. Focus on sustainable fashion and well-fitted garments. Love working with natural fibers and helping others build their sewing skills.

name: Fiona Artisan
headline: Fiber Artist & Natural Dye Expert
bio: Working with natural dyes and hand-spun fibers to create unique textile pieces. Passionate about traditional dyeing techniques using plants and natural materials. Create one-of-a-kind scarves and wall hangings.
